akn:section.akn:heading: Establishment of District of Columbia Emergency Medical Services Advisory Committee.

akn:content.akn:p: There is established a District of Columbia Emergency Medical Services Advisory Committee (“EMSAC”).

EMSAC shall advise the Mayor, the Chief and the Medical Director of the Fire and Emergency Medical Services Department, the Director of the Department of Health, the Director of the Department of Mental Health, and the Director of the Homeland Security Emergency Management Agency regarding issues related to emergency medical services in the District of Columbia.
EMSAC shall perform the following functions:
EMSAC shall be comprised of 17 members, 11 of whom shall be voting members appointed by the Mayor, and shall include:
